description: Test your basic knowledge of interfaces in TypeScript.
title: Let's Interface

answers.body: To create an instance of the 'Person' class.
To define the structure of objects that should be considered as 'Person'.
To create a concrete implementation of the 'Person' interface.
To restrict the 'Person' object to only hold primitive data types.

hint: Think about the purpose of TypeScript interfaces.
explanation: In TypeScript, interfaces are used to define the structure of objects. They provide a contract for the shape of objects, and the 'Person' interface, in this case, specifies that an object should have 'name' as a string and 'age' as a number.
